Tips for Pollo Feliz Recommends haaamean Joined 5 years ago 4.0 August 06, 2007 If it's good for Mexico then..... Pollo Feliz is also very popular in Mexico. I've eaten at those locations and the food tastes the same as it does in Tucson. The only variance is the tortillas. I've found NO ONE in Tucson that can make corn tortillas like they're made in Mexico with the machines and I've tried just about everywhere. Anyways, Pollo Feliz probably buys theirs elsewhere. Their food is a great price and is delicious. It's also halfway between fast food and formal dining, so you get your food quickly but get service at the table. … View More View Less 0 Heart Recommends desktoptrouble Joined 7 years ago 4.0 July 24, 2006 The McDonalds of Mexico. Pollo Feliz is a good favorite of mine. I love the chicken and the fresh condiments for your innexpensive meal. They also sell fresh homemade tortillas and offer authentic marinated grilled chicken dishes. Kids meals are quite tasty and healthier than most American Fast Food. This is a Fast Food restaurant so don't be misled. They have great catering packages for large groups and your company will not be disapointed. … View More View Less 0 Heart
